articles.author: Press Trust Of India
articles.title: India, US settle six WTO disputes; New Delhi to eliminate retaliatory customs duties - Republic World
articles.description: India and the US have agreed to end six trade disputes at the WTO while New Delhi will also remove retaliatory customs duties on 28 American products.
articles.content: India and the US have agreed to end six trade disputes at the World Trade Organisation while New Delhi will also remove retaliatory customs duties on 28 American products such as almonds, walnuts, an… [+3273 chars]
